content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────────────
### Copper Cable Factory Interface at (2.5, 17.5)
Consists of:
– Cable Factory Input Chest at (2.5, 17.5)
– New Factory Burner Inserter at (3.5, 17.5) [direction: RIGHT] with connected entities:
 • Burner Inserter at (2.5, 16.5)
 • Assembling Machine at (1.5, 19.5)

### Belt Depot Structure at (3.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
– Wooden Chest (belt depot) at (3.5, 15.5)
– Adjacent Transport Belt Segment at (4.5, 15.5)
– Depot Burner Inserter at (3.5, 14.5) [direction: UP]

### Extraction System Interface at (-3.5, 27.5)
Consists of:
– Extraction System Burner Inserter at (-3.5, 27.5) with drop position (–3.5, 28.5)

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────────────
• Transport Belt Connection Errors
 – Always use an inserter as the target for transport belt connections rather than directly targeting a steam engine object.

• Entity Placement Errors
 – Ensure the player is within the permitted distance when attempting to place an entity.
 – Confirm that the required item exists in inventory before placing.

• Variable Reference Errors
 – Validate that all variables are correctly defined before reference to avoid undefined name issues.
